column4: hi, i'm trying to mount an nfs share over an ipv6 scope link addresse, and I'm dramatically failing
do you know if the nfs client on natty handle ipv6 ? or is that my config which is wrong
I don't honestly know, but I'd try using showmount -e and rpcinfo to see if you can see the server with an IPv6 address
i'm gonna look this way, thanks for the pointers
